creator: jochen.wiedmann@softwareag.com
text:
When using TomCat in standalone mode, it seems there is a bug in the
thread pool of the PoolTcpConnector, which causes threads to get lost.
The problem can be demonstrated with a simple servlet throwing
exceptions and a default TomCat configuration. After some minutes you
keep getting the message

  ThreadPool: Pool exhausted with 100 threads.

In practice this causes TomCat to be out of service, because no
further requests can be processed.
